summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5967 for the improvement of Hudson Street from Corson Avenue to approximately 140 feet east of Swift Avenue; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 79732, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
